roleset.name: make narrower
roleset.note: NARROW-V NOTES: Frames file for 'narrow' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class other_cos-45.4, other framed members include decrease, halt, sweeten, and many others. (from narrow.01-v predicate notes)
NARROWED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from narrowed.01-j)

example.name: narrow-v: ergative
example.text: The Texas Oil& Gas division continues to operate in the red, although losses narrowed to $9 million from $15 million.

example.name: narrow-v: agentive
example.text: Combustion reported improved profits in its automation and control products businesses, and it narrowed its losses in its public sector and environmental segment.
example.arg: its losses in its public sector and environmental segment

example.name: narrow-v: passive
example.text: [That range]-1 was quickly narrowed *trace*-1 to $145 to $155, although traders surrounding the post were told that $148 to $150 would be the likely target.
example.arg: although traders surrounding the post were told that $148 to $150 would be the likely target

example.name: narrowing-n: Metaphorical
example.text: One of the strengths as well as weaknesses of contemporary academic life is its narrowing of expertise.

roleset.name: be narrow
roleset.note: NARROW-J NOTES: Based on medical adjectives. (from narrow.01-j)

example.name: narrow-j
example.text: The blanket is too narrow to serve as a cover.

roleset.name: eliminate possibilities
roleset.note: NARROW_DOWN-V NOTES: Added by Julia, Meredith for Google.

role.descr: original range of options, start state

example.name: narrow_down-v
example.text: We narrowed it down from 65 to 10
